about_the_game:
The game has been rebuilt and will be released within a few months.

Brief Overview:

  • Desert Map

  • AI Squads

  • Lootable Peripherals, Drivers, and Cores

  • Area Restrictions and Unbanned Items

  • Introduction of a New Mech Mode: Armor Peripheral-Assisted Shooting Game

Detailed Features:

  • When a player dies within the map, all mech equipment will be lost, including cores, drivers, and peripherals.

  • Players can pick up drivers, peripherals, and other items from AI and deceased players.

  • The armor surrounding the player can be damaged, affecting related functions once destroyed.

  • Peripherals include auto-targeting equipment, jet displacement devices, short-range ejectors, accelerated movement devices, laser weapon modules, mini-guns, artillery equipment, and many more. More peripherals are still being developed and designed.

  • There are numerous factors affecting survival within the game. Although it lowers the shooting threshold for FPS games, it introduces a higher mech hardness index, differentiating it from traditional mech games.
